Description.Manufacturer: Joe Out Back Of The Shed
Description.Name: Industrial Mech Quirk
Description.Details: This piece of equipment represents the inherent bonuses that IndustrialMechs have compared to regular BattleMechs. Industrial mechs are naturally skilled in melee, gaining an accuracy bonus with physical weapons, gaining an extra hit with their physical weapons and punches, taking 20% less stability damage, and finally also gaining self-damage prevention bonuses from DFAs and charges.

Description.Name: Industrial Melee Bonuses
Description.Details: Industrial mechs are naturally skilled in melee, gaining an accuracy bonus with physical weapons, gaining an extra hit with their physical weapons and punches, taking 20% less stability damage, and finally also gaining self-damage prevention bonuses from DFAs and charges.

Description.Name: Industrial Melee Bonuses
Description.Details: Industrial mechs are naturally skilled in melee, gaining accuracy and damage bonuses to punches and physical weapons, and self-damage prevention bonuses from DFAs and charges.
